ExternalData.Subtitlesect: Havana Charter for an International Trade Organization*

TreatyNote.Text: The conditions for the entry into force of the Havana Charter, set forth in its article 103, were not fulfilled within the prescribed time-limit. No instrument of acceptance was deposited with the Secretary-General. For the text of the Havana Charter, see United Nations Conference on Trade and Employment, Final Act and Related Documents, E/CONF.2/78, United Nations publication, Sales No. 1948.II.D.4.

Treaty.Footer: X 1 b. International Trade and Development
